data: Raphael Flauger News and Awards Scientists Confirm Events that Occurred One Second after the Big Bang Raphael Flauger Ph. D., UT Austin, 2009 Phone: 858-534-7504 rflauger@ucsd.edu Dr. Flauger has a diverse research portfolio that includes quantum field theory, string-motivated cosmology, and Cosmic Microwave Background (CMB) data analysis.
